termsOfServiceContent.title: Terms of Service
termsOfServiceContent.introduction: By using the POSum POS Compliance Center, you agree to the following terms of service. Please read these terms carefully before using our service.

section1.title: 1. Service Description
section1.content: POSum is a software service that enables your business to track financial transactions conducted through POS devices, calculate bank commissions, and manage reconciliation processes. Our service provides transaction tracking, commission calculation, reporting, and simulation tools.

section2.title: 2. User Responsibilities
section2.content: Users are responsible for the accuracy of all information entered into the system. It is the user's responsibility to keep account information secure, prevent unauthorized access, and use the system in compliance with laws. You are responsible for all activities performed under your account. You must immediately notify us if you notice any suspicious activity.

section3.title: 3. Privacy and Data Security
section3.content: The security of your financial data is our priority. All data is protected with industry-standard encryption technologies. Your data is used solely to provide the service and is not shared with third parties. For detailed information, please review our Privacy Policy.

section4.title: 4. Intellectual Property Rights
section4.content: The POSum platform, including its design, source code, logos, and all content, is the intellectual property of POSum. It may not be copied, reproduced, or distributed without written permission. Users have the right to use the system only for their own business purposes.

section5.title: 5. Service Changes and Cancellation
section5.content: POSum reserves the right to improve, modify, or terminate the service without prior notice. Accounts that violate the terms of service may be suspended or terminated. Upgrading to a paid subscription after the free trial period is optional.

section6.title: 6. Limitation of Liability
section6.content: POSum does not guarantee that the service will be uninterrupted and error-free. Calculations made through the platform are for informational purposes; we recommend seeking professional financial advice when making final decisions. POSum cannot be held liable for indirect damages resulting from system use.

section7.title: 7. Applicable Law
section7.content: These terms of service are subject to the laws of the Republic of Turkey. Disputes arising from service use will be resolved in Turkish courts. Your rights under KVKK (Personal Data Protection Law) are reserved.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: For questions about the terms of service: You can contact us at support@posum.com

privacyPolicyContent.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicyContent.introduction: At POSum, we value the privacy of your personal data. This policy explains the data we collect, how we use it, and your rights. We fulfill all our obligations under Law No. 6698 on the Protection of Personal Data (KVKK).

section1.title: 1. Data Controller
section1.content: As POSum POS Compliance Center, we are the data controller responsible for processing your personal data. Our contact information: support@posum.com

section2.title: 2. Personal Data Collected
section2.content:
When using our service, we collect the following data:

• Identity Information: Name, surname, email address
• Business Information: Company name, tax number
• Financial Transaction Data: POS device transactions, bank information, commission calculations
• Technical Data: IP address, browser information, usage logs
• Communication Information: Information shared in your support requests

section3.title: 3. Data Processing Purposes
section3.content:
Your personal data is processed for the following purposes:

• Service Provision: Operation of the POS reconciliation system and account management
• Security: Prevention of unauthorized access and security monitoring
• Communication: Customer support services and notifications
• Analysis: Improving service quality and developing new features
• Legal Obligations: Compliance with financial regulations and tax laws

section4.title: 4. Data Security
section4.content:
We take the following measures for data security:

• Data transmission with SSL/TLS encryption
• Encrypted database storage (AES-256)
• Regular security scans and updates
• Access control and authorization systems
• Daily backups and disaster recovery plans
• GDPR and KVKK compliant data processing

section5.title: 5. Data Sharing
section5.content:
Your personal data is not shared with third parties except in the following cases:

• Legal requirements (court orders, tax audits)
• Service providers (server service, email service) - protected by confidentiality agreements
• When you give explicit consent

Your data is never sold or rented for marketing purposes.

section6.title: 6. Your Rights Under KVKK
section6.content:
Under Law No. 6698, you have the following rights:

• To learn whether your personal data is being processed
• To request information if it has been processed
• To learn the purpose of processing and whether it is used appropriately
• To know the third parties to whom it has been transferred domestically or abroad
• To request correction if processed incompletely or incorrectly
• To request deletion or destruction within the framework provided by law
• To request notification of correction, deletion, or destruction to third parties
• To object to adverse results from automatic system analysis
• To demand compensation for damages if you suffer harm due to unlawful processing

section7.title: 7. Cookies
section7.content:
Our website uses cookies to improve user experience:

• Essential Cookies: Required for system operation
• Performance Cookies: To measure service quality
• Session Cookies: To remember your login information

You can manage your cookie preferences through your browser settings.

section8.title: 8. Data Retention Period
section8.content: Your personal data is stored for the period required by the processing purpose and considering legal storage obligations (Tax Procedure Law - 10 years). After this period, your data is securely deleted or anonymized.

section9.title: 9. Right to Apply
section9.content: To exercise your rights under KVKK, you can apply to support@posum.com. Your applications will be responded to within 30 days at the latest. You may need to verify your identity in your application.

section10.title: 10. Policy Updates
section10.content: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. Significant changes will be notified via email. You can review the most current version of the policy on our website.
